name: WIPE-IN
description:
This game was created during the Ludum Dare 49 in 3 days.

This is an isometric game inspired by Wipeout games but this time, the player does not participate in the race, he is trying to help the racers. To do so, you can disable the different traps and obstacles that the racers will face. 

Your goal is to make as many racers finish the run as possible. It define your score, if 10 of them wins your score is ten and if only 1 wins you only score one point.

There is several obstacles that the racers will face, the player can disable them, has to hold some of them to balance the weight of the racers and many more !

Controls :

Use A and D to move the camera backward and forward.

Click on the obstacle to either disable them, or click and hold down to balance obstacles.

Team : 

Game Programer - unreal_emir

Game Designer - Pierre-Louis Dulieu

Game Artist - Nanik
